posts.raw_content:
Just got this email from Lima Six, a company that makes a belt fed AR upper.

With zero warning or notice, Wordpress has just nuked our entire website for "violating their terms of service". This decision is apparently permanent, and we do not expect them to reverse it. 

The good news is, we performed regular backups of the site including all order information. Rest assured, if you placed an order with us, we still have your complete order information and there will be no delays in shipping your order due to this incident. 

When we first created this site two years ago, we researched the various ecommerce platforms to ensure we picked a platform that allowed for firearms and firearm accessories to be sold. At the time, Wordpress and WooCommerce (owned by the same company) were known to the industry as allowing firearms related content. In fact, there were many articles recommending WooCommerce as the preferred platform for gun companies. At the time, there was nothing in their terms of service preventing us from selling our product on their platform.

Now, it appears that they have changed their TOS without warning, and have permanently shut down our site without having a discussion or giving us to chance to argue our case. This is another example of how private companies are using their power to further infringe on first and second amendment rights. 

In addition to the webstore, we also had a discussion forum full of technical information, and it was a place where people could share their ideas and even upload files. With the click of a mouse, Wordpress has just denied us and our customers the ability to exercise our first amendment rights and freely communicate ideas. 

The fight is not over. As mentioned, we have the entire site backed up and will be back up and running on another platform very quickly. 

In the meantime if you need to get a hold of us, you can still call us at 215-956-0700 (monday-thursday 8:00am - 5:00pm eastern) and email us at contact.us@limasix.com. You can also message us on all of our social media pages.  

Please just be patient with us as we work diligently to migrate our site over to another platform.

Regards,
Harvey

Normally the VP Role in previous administrations was a token position ( Harris Pence Biden etc) They did nothing . But this Administration is using the VP in substantive roles and he is front and centre assisting in achieving results. When the President and VP are together they are side by side and the VP is allowed to participate, not be a token photo op.

This is Brilliant leadership by PRESIDENT Trump to keep JD in the public sphere for when he has to become the next President. A 4 year campaign.
